alert.note: Alert for Carroll; White (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued February 17 at 7:08AM EST until February 17 at 1:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... A Dam Floodgate Release in... Northwestern Carroll County in north central Indiana... Central White County in northwestern Indiana... * Until 100 PM EST. * At 707 AM EST, dam operators reported the floodgates on the Norway Dam were opened causing flash flooding downstream on the Tippecanoe River. HAZARD...Flash flooding from a dam floodgate release. SOURCE...Dam operator. IMPACT...Flooding of areas along the river immediately downstream of the dam. * The nearest downstream town is Monticello, located 2 and a half miles south of the dam. This includes the following streams and drainages... Tippecanoe River, Pike Creek and Big Creek. Flooding is occurring along the Tippecanoe River. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: If you are in low lying areas below the Norway Dam you should move to higher ground immediately. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
